Uses of Class
TicTacToe.Agent

    • Uses of Agent in TicTacToe

      Subclasses of Agent in TicTacToe 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggressiveAgent
      An aggressive agent: if there is a winning move, this agent always plays it.
      class  DefensiveAgent
      A defensive agent: if there is a move to block the opponent this agent will play it.
      class  HumanAgent
      A human agent that doesn't have a policy, instead asks the user to enter a move using a command line.
      class  PolicyIterationAgent
      A policy iteration agent.
      class  QLearningAgent
      A Q-Learning agent with a Q table, i.e.
      class  RandomAgent
      A random agent, i.e.
      class  ValueIterationAgent
      A Value Iteration Agent, only very partially implemented.

      (package private) Agent Game.o
      the O agent
      Agent Move.who
      can be either 'X', or 'O'
      (package private) Agent Game.whoseTurn 
      (package private) Agent Game.x

      Constructors in TicTacToe with parameters of type Agent 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(Agent x, Agent o)
      New game where x plays first
      Game(Agent x, Agent o, Agent whoseTurn)
      New game with X and O agents where it's whoseTurn's turn to play.
      Move(Agent who, int x, int y) 
      QLearningAgent(Agent opponent, double learningRate, int numEpisodes)
